Container.Name: musicbrainz
Container.Overview: MusicBrainz (LinuxServer single-container image). Note: LSIO image is deprecated; for full production consider MetaBrainz' docker-compose.
Container.Author: YourName

Variable.Name: PUID
Variable.Description: Host user id to run the container as

Variable.Name: PGID
Variable.Description: Host group id to run the container as

Variable.Name: BRAINZCODE
Variable.Description: MusicBrainz registration code (required to receive DB updates) — get from MusicBrainz site

Variable.Name: WEBADDRESS
Variable.Description: Host IP (no port) used to render CSS correctly — e.g. 192.168.1.50

Variable.Name: NPROC
Variable.Description: Optional: number of worker processes (defaults to 5 if unset)

Container.Note: After first startup the container will initialise and import the DB — this can take a long time (many GBs). If using UNRAID cache issues were reported: use /mnt/cache/appdata rather than /mnt/user/cache/appdata.
